text:
Weight gain 
= 12kg 
Travel /circle5
Wear seat belt in safe position for pregnancy 
/circle5Take advice if flying while pregnant – increased risk of 
thrombosis 

Safe Contact with Animals 
/circle5Cats can carry toxoplasmosis in their stools – don’t empty litter trays 
/circle5Toxoplasmosis passes into the soil – wash all salads and vegetables thoroughly, wear rubber gloves for gardening 
/circle5Reptiles are common carriers of salmonella 
/circle5Avoid any contact with pregnant or lamb
